xx.EUI_TEXT_NOTEBOOK_ITEM_SURVEY_MESSAGE:
Stop playing!

Please turn to the questionnaire and follow the instructions on-screen.

After finishing the survey, press X to continue.
xx.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_RESTART_LEVEL:
Are you sure you want to restart the level?
Any unsaved progress will be lost.
xx.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_RESTART_CHECKPOINT:
Are you sure you want to restart from the last checkpoint?
Any unsaved progress will be lost.
xx.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_EXIT_TO_MAIN_MENU:
Are you sure you want to exit to the main menu?
Any unsaved progress will be lost.
xx.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_RESTART_CONTRACT: Are you sure you want to restart this contract?
xx.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_EXIT_TO_MAIN_MENU_: Are you sure you want to exit to the main menu?

en.EUI_TEXT_NOTEBOOK_ITEM_SURVEY_MESSAGE:
Stop playing!

Please turn to the questionnaire and follow the instructions on-screen.

After finishing the survey, press X to continue.
en.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_RESTART_LEVEL:
Are you sure you want to restart the level?
Any unsaved progress will be lost.
en.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_RESTART_CHECKPOINT:
Are you sure you want to restart from the last checkpoint?
Any unsaved progress will be lost.
en.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_EXIT_TO_MAIN_MENU:
Are you sure you want to exit to the main menu?
Any unsaved progress will be lost.
en.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_RESTART_CONTRACT: Are you sure you want to restart this contract?
en.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_EXIT_TO_MAIN_MENU_: Are you sure you want to exit to the main menu?

fr.EUI_TEXT_NOTEBOOK_ITEM_SURVEY_MESSAGE:
Arrêtez de jouer !

Veuillez passer au questionnaire et suivre les instructions à l'écran.

Quand vous aurez terminé l'enquête, appuyez sur X pour continuer.
fr.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_RESTART_LEVEL:
Voulez-vous vraiment recommencer le niveau ?
Toute progression non sauvegardée sera perdue.
fr.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_RESTART_CHECKPOINT:
Voulez-vous vraiment recommencer à partir du dernier point de contrôle ?
Toute progression non sauvegardée sera perdue.
fr.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_EXIT_TO_MAIN_MENU:
Voulez-vous vraiment revenir au menu principal ?
Toute progression non sauvegardée sera perdue.
fr.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_EXIT_TO_MAIN_MENU_: Voulez-vous vraiment revenir au menu principal ?

it.EUI_TEXT_NOTEBOOK_ITEM_SURVEY_MESSAGE:
Basta giocare!

Passa al questionario e segui le istruzioni su schermo.

Dopo averlo completato, premi X per continuare.
it.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_RESTART_LEVEL:
Sei sicuro di voler riavviare il livello?
I progressi non salvati saranno persi.
it.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_RESTART_CHECKPOINT:
Sei sicuro di voler riavviare dall'ultimo checkpoint?
I progressi non salvati saranno persi.
it.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_EXIT_TO_MAIN_MENU:
Sei sicuro di voler tornare al menu principale?
I progressi non salvati saranno persi.
it.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_RESTART_CONTRACT: Sei sicuro di voler riavviare questo contratto?
it.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_EXIT_TO_MAIN_MENU_: Sei sicuro di voler uscire al menu principale?

de.EUI_TEXT_NOTEBOOK_ITEM_SURVEY_MESSAGE:
Hören Sie auf zu spielen!

Bitte kehren Sie zum Fragebogen zurück und folgen Sie den Bildschirmanweisungen.

Drücken Sie nach der Teilnahme an der Umfrage X, um fortzufahren.
de.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_RESTART_LEVEL:
Level wirklich neu starten?
Nicht gespeicherte Fortschritte gehen dabei verloren.
de.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_RESTART_CHECKPOINT:
Wirklich am letzten Kontrollpunkt neu starten?
Nicht gespeicherte Fortschritte gehen dabei verloren.
de.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_EXIT_TO_MAIN_MENU:
Wirklich zum Hauptmenü wechseln?
Nicht gespeicherte Fortschritte gehen dabei verloren.
de.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_RESTART_CONTRACT: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie diesen Auftrag neu starten möchten?
de.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_EXIT_TO_MAIN_MENU_: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie zum Hauptmenü zurückkehren möchten?

es.EUI_TEXT_NOTEBOOK_ITEM_SURVEY_MESSAGE:
¡Deja de jugar!

Por favor, lee el cuestionario y sigue las instrucciones que aparecen en pantalla.

Cuando termines con las preguntas, pulsa X para continuar.
es.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_RESTART_LEVEL:
¿Seguro que quieres reiniciar el nivel?
Perderás todos los progresos que no hayas guardado.
es.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_RESTART_CHECKPOINT:
¿Seguro que quieres reiniciar desde el último punto de control?
Perderás todos los progresos que no hayas guardado.
es.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_EXIT_TO_MAIN_MENU:
¿Seguro que quieres salir al menú principal?
Perderás todos los progresos que no hayas guardado.
es.EUI_TEXT_CONFIRMATION_EXIT_TO_MAIN_MENU_: ¿Seguro que quieres salir al menú principal?
